entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2.
